name: Intro to Computer Science
description: This course introduces the basics of programming, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques. Students will learn about fundamental data structures, basic coding, and the principles of software design.
subject: Computer Science

name: Principles of Marketing
subject: Business & Marketing
description: An overview of marketing concepts, including market research, consumer behavior, branding, and digital marketing strategies. This course explores the key tools and techniques used to develop successful marketing campaigns.

name: Modern European History
subject: History
description: This course covers major events in European history from the Enlightenment to the present, focusing on political, social, and economic changes that shaped the modern world.

name: Creative Writing Workshop
description: A workshop-based course where students create original pieces of fiction, poetry, and nonfiction. Peer feedback and revision techniques are emphasized.
subject: English & Literature
